title: password and credential stealing
extract: Credential theft, the first stage of a credential-based attack, is the process of stealing credentials. ... Corporate credential theft is usually a targeted effort. Attackers scour social media sites such as LinkedIn, searching for specific users whose credentials will grant access to critical data and information.
extract_html: Credential theft, the first stage of a credential-based attack, is the process of stealing credentials. ... Corporate credential theft is usually a targeted effort. Attackers scour social media sites such as LinkedIn, searching for specific users whose credentials will grant access to critical data and information.
